variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.
This deletion leads to a frameshift and premature stop codon.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A, compared to wild type control.
No detectable protein product was observed for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.250delG.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed. Statistical significance was assessed by ANOVA.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control, expressing the full-length protein.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control, showing no protein expression.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis. p<0.05 considered significant.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of control on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of control on day 7.

Material used.Description: RNA was extracted from HEK293 cells transfected with plasmids containing the variant constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Transcript levels of the variant construct were reduced by 30% compared to control.
No detectable mRNA transcript was observed for the variant construct.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis. p<0.05 considered significant.
